documentation.title: Function Closing Brace Space
documentation.standard: There should be a single blank line before the function closing brace.

code.title: Valid: A single blank line before the function closing brace.
Invalid: No blank line before the function closing brace.

documentation.standard: Closing brace of nested function must be on a new line.

code.title: Valid: Nested function closing brace is on a new line.
Invalid: Nested function closing brace on the same line.

documentation.standard: Closing brace of nested function must not be followed by a blank line.

code.title: Valid: No blank line before the closing brace of a nested function.
Invalid: A single blank line before the closing brace of a nested function.
